commands.title: Search Wolfram Alpha
commands.requestDescriptionForModel: Given the following request payload, and API spec. Generate the endpoint to call from the API sepc based on the value in the request payload. Put the url in between <result></result> tags [Request payload] {{$input}} [End Request Payload] [API Spec] {{$apispec}} [End API Spec]
commands.responseDescriptionForModel: Convert this input to one Microsoft adaptive card using version 1.4. Only convert up to 5 sections in the input from beginning excluding query, input interpretation and website results. Do not include any buttons in the card and do not include any inputs. The result should only contain valid json for the cards only and explicitly render the entire cards. Do not include comments. Put the json array of cards in <result></result> tags. [Input] {{$input}} [End Input]
